00033 // Default values
00034 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_VOLTAGE                   0
00035 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_PERCENTAGE                0
00036 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_SIZE                      0xFF
00037 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_QUANDITY                  0
00038 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_ALARM_MASK                0
00039 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_ALARM_STATE               0
00040 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_MIN_THREASHOLD            0
00041 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_THREASHOLD_1          0
00042 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_THREASHOLD_2          0
00043 #define ZCL_DS_DEFAULT_BATTERY_THREASHOLD_3          0

00070 #define ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_FREQUENCY_ATTRIBUTE_ID                 CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00071 #define ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_ALARM_MASK_ATTRIBUTE_ID                CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0010)
00072 #define ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_VOLTAGE_MIN_THRESHOLD_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0011)
00073 #define ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_VOLTAGE_MAX_THRESHOLD_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0012)
00074 #define ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_VOLTAGE_DWELL_TRIP_POINT_ATTRIBUTE_ID  CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0013)

00154 #define ZCL_DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES(reportMin, reportMax) \
00155   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(mainsVoltage, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE,  ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_VOLTAGE_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00156   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(mainsFrequency, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAINS_FREQUENCY_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00157   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(batterySourceOneSize, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_SIZE_ID, ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00158   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(batterySourceOneQuantity, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_QUANDITY_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00159   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(batterySourceOneAlarmMask, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_ALARM_MASK_ID, ZCL_8BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00, 0x0F), \
00160   DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(batterySourceOneAlarmState, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE , ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_ALARM_STATE_ID, ZCL_32BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID, reportMin, reportMax, 0x00, 0x00FFFFFF), \
00161   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(batterySourceOneVoltage, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE , ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_VOLTAGE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00162   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(batterySourceOneVoltageMinThreshold, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE , ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_VOLTAGE_MIN_THRESHOLD_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00163   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(batterySourceOneVoltageThreshold_1, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE , ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_BATTERY_SOURCE_1_VOLTAGE_THRESHOLD_1_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \

00200 #define POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)  \
00201   { \
00202     .id = POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ID, \
00203     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00204     .attributesAmount = ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00205     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes), \
00206     .commandsAmount = ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00207     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00208   }
00209 
00210 #define POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00211   { \
00212     .id = POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ID, \
00213     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00214     .attributesAmount = ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00215     .attributes = NULL, \
00216     .commandsAmount = ZCL_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00217     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00218   }
00219 
00220 #define DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00221     POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00222   
00223 #define ZCL_DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER_FLASH(clattributes) ZCL_DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes)
00224 #define ZCL_DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_CLIENT_FLASH() ZCL_DEFINE_POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_CLIENT()
00225 
00226 #define BATTERY_ONE_MIN_THRESHOLD_MASK   (1ul<<0)
00227 #define BATTERY_ONE_THRESHOLD_1_MASK     (1ul<<1)
00228 #define BATTERY_ONE_THRESHOLD_2_MASK     (1ul<<2)
00229 #define BATTERY_ONE_THRESHOLD_3_MASK     (1ul<<3)
00230 #define BATTERY_TWO_MIN_THRESHOLD_MASK   (1ul<<10)
00231 #define BATTERY_TWO_THRESHOLD_1_MASK     (1ul<<11)
00232 #define BATTERY_TWO_THRESHOLD_2_MASK     (1ul<<12)
00233 #define BATTERY_TWO_THRESHOLD_3_MASK     (1ul<<13)
00234 #define BATTERY_THREE_MIN_THRESHOLD_MASK (1ul<<20)
00235 #define BATTERY_THREE_THRESHOLD_1_MASK   (1ul<<21)
00236 #define BATTERY_THREE_THRESHOLD_2_MASK   (1ul<<22)
00237 #define BATTERY_THREE_THRESHOLD_3_MASK   (1ul<<23)
